prompt:
Assess the safety risks in this street view image.

Identify risks by category:
HIGH RISK: [List high-risk elements]
MEDIUM RISK: [List medium-risk elements]  
LOW RISK: [List low-risk elements]

Overall Risk Level: [LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH]
Primary Risk Factor: [Main safety concern]

Image: Sample SVI\18.jpg
expected_response:
HIGH RISK: heavy vehicle traffic with multiple lanes, wide road increases pedestrians exposure, lack of visible crosswalk in the immediate foreground
MEDIUM RISK: some sidewalks are visible, parking garage entrance/exit nearby increases vehicle-pedestrian conflict points, pavement appears somewhat worn, possible maintenance issues
LOW RISK: good visibility during daytime, likely presence of traffic signals and crosswalks further along the road, street trees and urban design may reduce speeding desires

Overall Risk Level: HIGH
Primary Risk Factor: heavy traffic volume with limited immediate pedestrian protections
